'''Sharktacular Surfari''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] in [[Version 5.0]].

==Wish Details==
===Duration===
* 2024-08-28 11:00:00 UTC+8 &mdash; 2024-09-17 17:59:59

===Summary===
* In this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character {{Wish Item|Mualani}} will get a huge drop-rate boost!
* During this event wish, the 4-star characters {{Wish Item|Kachina;Xinyan;Bennett}} will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."
* For information about rates, see [[Wish]]es.
